QuestData.Title: Demons in the Citadel
QuestData.Description: One of our scouts spotted what he thought was an agent of the Burning Legion somewhere in the ramparts. If that is true, then Honor Hold may be in grave danger of a combined assault!$B$BIf you find this fiend in there, kill it on sight.
QuestData.LogDescription: Slay Omor the Unscarred and bring his hoof to Advance Scout Chadwick.
QuestData.CompletionText: Did you find any demons in there?
QuestData.RewardText: So it's true. The fel orcs and the Burning Legion are working together in some capacity.
